57327.summary: Some customers in the South West (Esler) area of Williams Lake are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57327.title: Jan 26 - Williams Lake | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
